name: @colinwalker I've truly enjoyed my "On this Day" feature! I have my website automatically push the content to my reader application on a daily basis. Such a fun reminder of my memories.

content.html: @colinwalker I've truly enjoyed my "On this Day" feature! I have my website automatically push the content to my reader application on a daily basis. Such a fun reminder of my memories.

summary: It was your Clevercast episode about ridding yourself of Facebook that got me thinking about it (I’m going to do a proper write-up and credit you) but there didn’t seem to be any plugins out there so I thought I’d try putting something together.
